title: Unable to connect to Login queue
body:
I am unable to connect to the login queue, even from the support center website :/ however, if I use a VPN and switch my location it works fine. But VPN kills my ping :) Please help :D

Also I have tried everything at https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944#section-mac and since the VPN backed login works I don't think the issue is on my machine.

replies.body: pretty sure this happened 2 or 3 days ago as well

Since that VPN was able to get you through to our servers, the main problem most likely lies with how your ISP is routing your connection to our servers. Let's test this theory really quickly by running a quick trace route to our NA servers at 192.64.170.1 using a program like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/). Copy what it gives you, and paste it here so I can see what's going on.
After the VPN worked I did try to traceroute league servers from VPN and sans VPN but the bug seems to have fixed itself.
